LanguageData.Apparel_Balaclava_CP.label: balaclava
LanguageData.Apparel_Balaclava_CP.description: A balaclava, also known as a balaclava helmet or ski mask, is a form of cloth headgear designed to expose only part of the face.
LanguageData.Apparel_BalaclavaS_CP.label: Sternmeyer balaclava
LanguageData.Apparel_Beret.label: beret
LanguageData.Apparel_Beret.description: A soft, round, flat-crowned hat, usually of woven, hand-knitted wool, crocheted cotton, wool felt, or acrylic fibre.
LanguageData.Apparel_Cap.label: cap
LanguageData.Apparel_Cap.description: A cap is a form of headgear. Caps have crowns that fit very close to the head and have no brim or only a visor. They are typically designed for warmth and, when including a visor, blocking sunlight from the eyes. They come in many shapes and sizes.
LanguageData.Apparel_KevlarHelmet.label: kevlar helmet
LanguageData.CP_Arasaka_Helmet.label: Arasaka Combat Helmet
LanguageData.CP_Esporma_Helmet.label: Esporma Environment Helmet
LanguageData.CP_Esporma_Helmet.description: The Esporma Environment Helmet is a must of any situation that may include poisonous gasses, bioweapons, or corrosive materials. This helmet includes a hood with face shield as well as an internal oxygen supply.
LanguageData.CP_Medic_Helmet.label: TTI Paramedic Helmet
LanguageData.CP_Medic_Helmet.description: Worn by paramedic units, these helmets provide protection as well as an anti-dazzle visor and a two-way radio.
LanguageData.CP_MGHelmet.label: MetalGear™ helmet
LanguageData.CP_MGHelmet.description: Laminated expoxide plated helmet from the MetalGear™ armor set.
LanguageData.CP_MM88_Helmet.label: Militech M88 Combat Helmet
LanguageData.CP_MM88_Helmet.description: The M-88 is a fully enclosed infantry helmet that is currently being issued to special attack and guard units. The communications microphone and earphones are built in, as is a small, forward facing video camera array which not only provides input for night vision systems but can transmit images back to a rearechelon receiver. The face shield functions as a heads-up display which is interfaced with a belt-pack accepting chipped data, such as maps.
LanguageData.CP_MM88A2_Helmet.label: Militech M88A2 Combat Helmet
LanguageData.CP_MM88A2_Helmet.description: The M-88A2 is an enhanced combat helmet model with greater protective and analytic capability than the M-88. It has an integral face shield and respirator and offers complete protection against all inhaled agents. The communications microphone and earphones are built in, as is a small, forward facing video camera array which not only provides input for night vision systems but can transmit images back to a rearechelon receiver. The face shield functions as a heads-up display which is interfaced with a belt-pack accepting chipped data, such as maps.
LanguageData.CP_Smart_Helmet.label: Smart Helmet
LanguageData.CP_Smart_Helmet.description: The smart helmet provides some protection as well as utilizing smart interface links for aiming assist.
